data.title: Bucknell University
data.meta_description: Casey Stephenson (74) Offensive Line - 2023 (Senior): Team captain ... played in 10 games and made nine starts at left guard ... recipient of C. Dale Wolfe R...
data.text:
2023 (Senior): Team captain ... played in 10 games and made nine starts at left guard ... recipient of C. Dale Wolfe Recognition Award as most inspirational player.

2022 (Junior): Appeared in nine games, making six starts at left guard.

2021 (Sophomore): Was expected to be Bucknell's starting left guard but lost the season to an injury suffered in preseason camp.

2021 Spring (Freshman): Started all three appearances at left guard ... one of four freshmen to start for the Bison.

St. Joseph's Preparatory School: Lettered four times in football … led the Hawks to a 49-3 overall record, including unbeaten 14-0 marks in 2018 and 2016 …. member of the 2019, 2018 and 2016 PIAA 6A state championship teams … member of the 2017 PIAA 6A state runner-up squad … St. Joseph's also won four city titles and four league crowns … 2019 all-state first team … two-time all-Southeastern Pennsylvania first team … two-time all-city first team … two-time all-catholic first team … served as team captain.

Personal: Casey Napoleon Stephenson … born October 8, 2001 in Charlotte, North Carolina … son of Napoleon and Natalie Stephenson … has three older brothers: Cameron, Carson and Conner … Cameron played club lacrosse at the University of Arizona … cousin Justin Gatlin is an Olympic and World champion sprinter … cousin Ed Reed, the 2004 NFL Defensive Player of the Year and a nine-time Pro Bowler, was inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 2019 … major is undeclared.
